items.content_html: This PR uses the mdn-bcd-collector project (v4.0.0) to populate results for WebView Android v3 (I have just obtained an Android 3.2 device to test with). This PR focuses on changes from â‰¤37 to 3.
items.title: Add data for WebView Android v3.0

items.content_html:
This PR updates and corrects the real values for Opera and Opera Android for the XPathResult API, based upon results from the mdn-bcd-collector project (v4.0.0).

Tests Used: https://mdn-bcd-collector.appspot.com/tests/api/XPathResult

Check out the collector's guide on how to review this PR.
items.title: Update Opera versions for XPathResult API
